content:
In ~all(?) recent ish builds I'm seeing the timestamp pretty significantly different from the expected time - which seems strange

local time: Thu Nov 11 05:44:52 UTC 2021
network time: Wed, 10 Nov 2021 17:28:17 GMT
I haven't tried to figure out which of these is right yet
correction: the detectportal.firefox.com server returns random dates, I suspect
seems like weird behavior, but alright, I'll put up a PR switching us to something else
if only there were some sort of time synchronization protocol
